features: ✔【NEW LOOKING】Do you need a Full Length Mirror for your bedroom as decoration and filler. This arched full length mirror with metal frame is just what you need, whether as a gift for room or hallway use is a good choice, get it immediately in Otlsh store.

High-definition reflective lens and covered with hot-melt explosion-proof film on the back to protect your family's safety.

✔【INSTALLATION】 If you want Freestanding you can open it and use it. Or you want to hang it on the wall, it's very simple, just remove the screws on the back and remove the U-bracket, using screws and drywall anchors. Of course leaning against the wall is also a good idea.
✔【PERFECT FIT】64" x 21" perfect full size to show your whole body and expand the visual space of the room. Whether it is natural light or human light, it can provide enough light to the room.

✔【100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE】High quality and stylish full length mirrors are perfect for housewarming gifts, Christmas gifts or other holiday gifts. Shop with confidence in Otlsh Store, if the mirrors is damaged when it arrives, Or you want to replace it, please contact us in time with Amazon Message and we will provide you with the best solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 58"×18" Arched Full Length Mirror Arched with StandI just finished mounting this mirror and overall I’m super impressed with the quality, especially for a mirror under $100 (I got it for $69).Pros:• As stated above, a great price!• It was well packed with a combination of ½” and ¾” rigid foam all around with plywood reinforced ends. It arrived in mint condition in two days with Prime shipping.• The frame is made of square aluminum tubing and is very rigid.• The ‘fun house’ mirror effect that some complain about was only observable when I stood half way across the room, focused on a single object (table lamp) and moved slowly from side to side. Honestly, if I wasn’t looking for it I wouldn’t have picked up on the minimal distortion (certainly not enough to move this comment to the Cons section• The stand was fully assembled and recessed into the frame to allow me to leave it in place and still mount flat to the wall.Cons:• It was listed as 18”x58” but it was closer to 17 ¼” W by just short of 58”L.• The mounting brackets are heavy duty but unfortunately they are a rigid key-hole-slot design with no room for mounting measurement errors. Typical, brackets have an adjustable triangular piece of heavy metal at the top of each wall mounting point and allow for some degree of inaccuracy in width spacing between the brackets. Not these puppies. Be sure your measurements are accurate down to the 16th inch (see tip below).• Speaking of the brackets, they were attached with a 1/8” difference in height (bottom to top). I needed to adjust the wall anker for different heights to compensate.Installation Tip:• Reuse a long piece of the shipping plywood to make a template for the screw holes. This will save you from having a crooked mirror or patching drywall.• Layout the spacing exactly as you think you will on the wall. If you need to adjust one of the screws vertically to compensate for different bracket heights, this is the place to do it before drilling into the wall in the wrong place.• Drill 1/8” holes in the plywood exactly where the screws will be located and inert them almost completely into the template.• Flip the template over and slide the screw heads onto the frame brackets to see if you got all of the spacing right. I measured from the frame bottom to the mounted template.• When it fits correctly. Back out the screws until the tips just barely protrude from the wood.• Using a level against the wood strip and with the screw tips lightly touching the wall, position the template where you want to drill holes and tap it to mark screw hole locations in the drywall. Drill ¼” holes in the drywall for the ankers, insert screws almost all the way into the ankers and hang you new mirror.• Because the brackets are on the rear edges of the frame it will be no problem seeing both the screw and bracket from the sides to mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful mirror but kind of shabby construction
reviews.reviewText: The mirror is beautiful, and the reflection is really good. No distortion/waviness. Frame is ok, although the paint has already started to fade after only 2-3 cleanings/wipes with a gentle cleaning pad and water. I like the size and otherwise it seems well made. I like the hanging hooks as well, in case you want it on the wall.My main issue with it is the way in which the back stand is attached to the frame. It seems like a really stupid design flaw -- the pivot bolt is very close to the back of the mirror, which is unprotected glass. As a result, when you extend the stand, there is a little bit of extra metal material above the pivot which scrapes the back of the mirror. I noticed where it touches, it has already scraped off a small part of the reflective amalgam on the back of the mirror. You can see two little damage black spots on the front. Very small, but annoying because this is just an elementary design flaw. It's does not appear to be faulty or broken, this is the actual design.You can unscrew the base and 'reverse' the brackets so that it still works without scraping the glass, or you can just remove it and hang/lean it.I would have given it 5 stars if it wasn't for that minor issue. Not worth returning since the damage is small (most people would probably not even notice it), and the new one would likely have the same issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed a full length mirror gave mine all away because I moved out of state & it survived shipping plus the move in the back of my truck so I'm impressed . It's really pretty and can be mounted on the wall or free standing . It's perfect for my needs & very inexpensive for the size

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant piece with practicality
reviews.reviewText: I can confidently say that this arched full-length mirror has enhanced both the visual appeal and functionality of my space. It’s a delightful addition to my home, and I would highly recommend it to anyone seeking a mirror that seamlessly combines beauty and practicality.If you’re looking for a mirror that not only reflects your image but also reflects your taste for elegance, this arched full-length mirror is an excellent choice. It’s a five-star addition to my home! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
